testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDetectorStatusRequest dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.6.1.3 [Need to Share Detector Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R365_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R365_Authentication_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Content of Device Information Request Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R377_Authentication_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R377_Authentication_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R384_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R384_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R385_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R385_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R385_Event_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R385_Event_Identifier_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported}

Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported}

Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 37 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 39 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 40 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 41 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 42 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 43 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 44 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.6.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 45 CONFIGURE: Define the response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: ResponseMessage: ${ResponseMessage}
Step 46 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 47 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 48 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 49 CONFIGURE: Identify the Organization Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OrganizationID: ${OrganizationID}
Step 50 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 51 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 52 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}
Step 53 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT is expected to have valid data available for a response message in this test. RECORD this information as: DataValid: ${DataValid}

Step 54 REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorStatusRequest AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password ORGANIZATIONID = OrganizationID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected DATAVALID = DataValid
Step 55 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.1 IF TMDD_N20R365_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.1.1 VERIFY that element authentication exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 55.2 IF TMDD_N20R366_External_Center_Organization_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.2.1 VERIFY that element organization-requesting exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 55.3 IF TMDD_N20R367_Content_of_Device_Information_Request_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.3.1 VERIFY that element device-filter exists within deviceInformationRequestMsg
Step 55.4 IF TMDD_N20R368_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.4.1 VERIFY that element device-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 55.5 IF TMDD_N20R369_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.5.1 VERIFY that element network-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 55.6 IF TMDD_N20R370_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.6.1 VERIFY that element link-id-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 55.7 IF TMDD_N20R371_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.7.1 VERIFY that element link-designator-list exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 55.8 IF TMDD_N20R372_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.8.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 55.9 IF TMDD_N20R377_Authentication_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.10 IF TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.11 IF TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.12 IF TMDD_N20R379_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.13 IF TMDD_N20R378_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.14 IF TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.15 IF TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.16 IF TMDD_N20R380_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.17 IF TMDD_N20R381_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.18 IF TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 55.20 IF TMDD_N20R384_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 55.23 IF TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.24 IF TMDD_N20R383_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.25 IF TMDD_N20R384_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.26 IF TMDD_N20R382_Operator_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.27 IF TMDD_N20R385_Event_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.27.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 55.28 IF TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.28.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 55.29 IF TMDD_N20R386_Event_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.29.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list

Step 55.30.1 VERIFY that element network-id exists within each instance of deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter.network-id-list
Step 55.31 IF TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.32 IF TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.33 IF TMDD_N20R387_Event_Response_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.34 IF TMDD_N20R388_Event_Response_Plan_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 55.40 IF TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.41 IF TMDD_N20R389_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.42 IF TMDD_N20R391_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.43 IF TMDD_N20R390_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 55.44 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 55.45 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True
Step 55.46 POSTCONDITION: REQUEST-RESPONSE-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDetectorStatusRequest OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified RESPONSEMESSAGE = ResponseMessage
